messages.savedForNotAllChannels: Attribute '%s' was linked not for all chosen channels.
messages.unlinkRelatedAttribute: Are you sure you want to delete the selected Attribute from the selected Classification? All related records will retain this Attribute.
messages.cascadeUnlinkRelatedAttribute: Are you sure you want to delete the selected attribute from the selected Classification and their related records? All related Attribute Values will be also removed.
messages.removeRelatedAttributeGroup: Are you sure you want to delete all Attributes for the selected Attribute Group from the selected Classification? All related records will retain these Attributes.
messages.removeRelatedAttributeGroupCascade: Are you sure you want to delete all attributes for the selected Attribute Group from the selected Classification and their related records? All related Attribute Values will be also removed.
